revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #10 Razz |image = [[File:Razz.png]] |caption = A small hint of spiciness lingers in the red granules surrounding this Berry. Their centers have a dry taste. |growtime = 4m 10s |harvest = 7 berries |replant = 40% |points = 15 |flavor =
*10 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Razz''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Cheri]] and at least 1 [[Leppa]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stage Durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- | 0-100s || 100-150s || 150-200s || 200-250s || 250-500s |- | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:RazzTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:RazzTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:RazzTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in following way to obtain Razz berries. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[Cheri]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[Leppa]] || || || [[Leppa]] |- style="height: 26px;" | || || || || |- | [[Cheri]] || || || [[Cheri]] || |- | || [[Leppa]] || || || [[Leppa]] |}
